name: button gap
description:
This is a LoRA model trained to push the limits of shirt buttons. Danbooru based models already understand the tag button gap to an extent, but this LoRA makes it easier to generate at a range of breast sizes.


With the latest A1111 as of Jan/2023 you can now load LoRA models in the same way you load Hypernetworks and Embeddings


Tips:

  • Seems to pair well with my hyperbreasts LoRA

  • use the negative tag topless when needed

  • suggesting the type of shirt or tightness of the fabric can help persuade the model

modelVersions.name: v1
modelVersions.description:
A1111 now has support for LoRA models!

Training Details:

  • 100 images

  • LR 8e-5

  • batch 2

  • GA 8

  • dim 4

  • base model Av3

  • Av3 VAE

  • 90 epocs

  • flip aug

  • clip skip 2

  • only Unet training

  • 768 res, no bucketing
